org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.utils

Class EntitlementUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.utils.EntitlementUtils

  • public final class EntitlementUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods for managing entitlements.

      • createApplicationType

        public static ApplicationType createApplicationType(String name,
                                                    Map<String,Set<String>> data)
                                             throws InstantiationException,
                                                    IllegalAccessException
        Constructs an ApplicationType object based on the provided information.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the application type.
        data - The configuration settings for the application type.
        Returns:
        An ApplicationType object corresponding to the provided details.
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - If the class settings cannot be instantiated.
        IllegalAccessException - If the class settings cannot be instantiated.

      • createApplication

        public static Application createApplication(ApplicationType applicationType,
                                            String name,
                                            Map<String,Set<String>> data)
                                     throws InstantiationException,
                                            IllegalAccessException,
                                            EntitlementException
        Constructs an Application object based on the provided information.
        Parameters:
        applicationType - The application's type.
        name - The name of the application.
        data - The configuration settings for the application.
        Returns:
        An Application object corresponding to the provided details.
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - If the class settings cannot be instantiated.
        IllegalAccessException - If the class settings cannot be instantiated.
        EntitlementException - If the application class cannot be instantiated.

        public static Set<String> getActionSet(Map<String,Boolean> actions)
        Converts the map of actions into a set format where the map's key->value combinations are separated by an equals character.
        Parameters:
        actions - The map of actions that needs to be converted.
        Returns:
        The set of actions in key=value format.

        public static String getCombiner(Map<String,Set<String>> data)
        Returns the combiner from the provided set of data within the entitlement format.
        Parameters:
        data - The entire set of information about an application. May not be null.
        Returns:
        A string of the combiners name, or null if the data set is empty.

        Returns:

      • getAttribute

        public static String getAttribute(Map<String,Set<String>> data,
                                  String attributeName)
        Returns the first attribute value for the corresponding attributeName in the data map.
        Parameters:
        data - The map where the attribute should be retrieved from.
        attributeName - The name of the attribute that should be retrieved from the map.
        Returns:
        The attribute from the map corresponding to the provided attribute name, or null if no such attribute is present in the map.

      • getAttribute

        public static String getAttribute(Map<String,Set<String>> data,
                                  String attributeName,
                                  String defaultValue)
        Returns the first attribute value for the corresponding attributeName in the data map.
        Parameters:
        data - The map where the attribute should be retrieved from.
        attributeName - The name of the attribute that should be retrieved from the map.
        defaultValue - The value to return if the requested value is null.
        Returns:
        The attribute from the map corresponding to the provided attribute name, or defaultValue if no such attribute is present in the map.

      • getDateAttributeAsLong

        public static long getDateAttributeAsLong(Map<String,Set<String>> data,
                                          String attributeName)
        Returns the first attribute value for the corresponding attributeName in the data map and parses it to a long.
        Parameters:
        data - The map where the attribute should be retrieved from.
        attributeName - The name of the attribute that should be retrieved from the map.
        Returns:
        The attribute from the map corresponding to the provided attribute name, parsed to a long. If the attribute does not exist the current date time will be returned.

      • getAdminToken

        public static SSOToken getAdminToken()
        Returns an admin SSO token for administrative actions.
        Returns:
        An administrative SSO token.

      • getSSOToken

        public static SSOToken getSSOToken(Subject subject)
        Returns the SSO token for the given subject.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject for which the token is required.
        Returns:
        An SSO token.

      • getEntitlementCombiner

        public static Class<? extends EntitlementCombiner> getEntitlementCombiner(String name)
        Attempts to retrieve the Java Class associated with the name of an entitlement combiner. First, we attempt to use the new system, that being the application itself can look up the name from the EntitlementRegistry such that the name is registered in there. This may fail. This step will be skipped if app is null. Second, attempts to use the given string to find a class using the provided name. This is so that older systems which used the canonical name to refer to the class to instantiate correctly find their class. This may also fail. If this fails, we simply return the default: DenyOverride.
        Parameters:
        name - the name used to reference the combiner. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        the class represented by the name

      • getSubjectsShortNames

        public static Set<String> getSubjectsShortNames()
        Returns all the short names of EntitlementSubjects currently registered in this EntitlementRegistry.
        Returns:
        A set of strings containing all the unique EntitlementSubject registered at point of query.

      • getConditionsShortNames

        public static Set<String> getConditionsShortNames()
        Returns all the short names of EntitlementConditions currently registered in this EntitlementRegistry.
        Returns:
        A set of strings containing all the unique EntitlementConditions registered at point of query.

      • resourceTypeFromMap

        public static ResourceType resourceTypeFromMap(String uuid,
                                               Map<String,Set<String>> data)
        Create a ResourceType object from a map, mapping strings to sets.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid of the created resource type object.
        data - The data map for the object.
        Returns:
        The newly created ResourceType object.

      • getEntitlementConfiguration

        public static EntitlementConfiguration getEntitlementConfiguration(Subject subject,
                                                                   String realm)
        Get a new instance of the EntitlementConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        subject - The requesting Subject.
        realm - The realm for which the configuration is required.
        Returns:
        The EntitlementConfiguration for the given realm.

      • getApplicationService

        public static ApplicationService getApplicationService(Subject subject,
                                                       String realm)
        Get a new instance of the ApplicationService.
        Parameters:
        subject - The requesting Subject.
        realm - The realm for which the configuration is required.
        Returns:
        The ApplicationService for the given realm.

      • getEntitlementConfigurationRealm

        public static String getEntitlementConfigurationRealm(String realm)
        Gets the realm to obtain entitlements configuration (Application and ResourceType instances) from. For all realms except /sunamhiddenrealmdelegationservicepermissions, this will be the realm as passed in. For that realm, however, the root realm is returned.
        Parameters:
        realm - The realm being queried.
        Returns:
        The realm to use for entitlements configuration objects.
